mapper.update: update deliveryreceipt set d_destinationcity = #{dDestinationcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_arrivedcity = #{dArrivedcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_status = #{dStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_createtime = #{dCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, d_remark = #{dRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where d_startcity = #{dStartcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select d_startcity, d_destinationcity, d_arrivedcity, d_status, d_createtime, d_remark from deliveryreceipt
